revised_title: Investigating the Annual Variation of Magnetic Declination at Different Periods of the Day
tldr: The author analyzes the annual variation of magnetic declination at four British colonial observatories, including Toronto, Hobarton, the Cape of Good Hope, and St. Helena. The study aims to understand the physical explanation of the annual and diurnal variations of terrestrial magnetism and provide a comprehensive view of the facts by separating and presenting each class of facts individually.
